What complications can 
happen?
A caesarean section is usually 
safe and your obstetrician 
believes it is the safest way to 
deliver your baby.  However, 
complications can happen.  
Some of these can be serious 
and can even cause death.
Complications of anaesthesia
Your anaesthetist will be 
able to discuss with you the 
possible complications of 
having an anaesthetic.
